data.name: Is a point inside an random area...
data.description:
Task:
Determine if a point [x,y] is inside an area represent by an array [[x1,y1],[x2,y2]....[xn,yn]] Input:
- point {array} = [x,y]
- area {nested array} = [[x1,y1],[x2,y2],.....[xn,yn]] Rule:
We need at least 3 point to form an area. If point in area < 3 then return false. Output:
if [x,y] is inside the area, return true.
if [x,y] is outside the area, return false.
if the point is located in the edge of the area, return true Example:
isPointInsideArea( [1,2] , [ [0,0] , [3,0] , [3,3] , [0,3] ] ) => true
isPointInsideArea( [0,2] , [ [-2,-2] , [-2,2] , [2,2] , [2,-2] ] ) => true
isPointInsideArea( [0,1] , [ [0,0] , [-3,0] ] ) => false
isPointInsideArea( [2,-2] , [ [-2,-2] , [-2,2] , [2,2] , [2,-2] ] ) => true
